name: Another to the Count
description:
Your name is Mason.

Not too long ago, a close internet friend of yours, Christopher, had disappeared. It was ruled that he had committed suicide. After the funeral,  your friend group decides to celebrate Christopher's life by going hunting; what used to be his favourite past time.

You realize immediately that going hunting was a grave mistake. As you unravel the mystery of Christopher's disappearance, you must make decisions that determine the fate of you and your friends. Will you save everyone? Or will you meet your end in the woods?
